ygData.subject: [EQ Wizard/Items] Nightshade wreath
ygData.msgSnippet: A friend wishes a nightshade wreath (and from the stats who wouldnt). Another friend had this to say.... Nightshade wreath is in the DEEPEST part of Mistmoore
ygData.messageBody:
A friend wishes a nightshade wreath (and from the stats who wouldnt). Another friend had this to say....

Nightshade wreath is in the DEEPEST part of Mistmoore
castle's first level.... TONS of mobs to get by.. yes you can get by them
with inviso and if your high enough (48th+ or so) you can solo pull mobs
away from her "door." But alas shes (Maid Issisi) guarded by 3 mobs and theres a few right nearby.. so its kinda tough...

So, can anyone suggest strategy or spells or classes or levels to go after this thing? Ive never seen one auctioned, but heard that they are trade only.

Nightshade wreath
+5 WIS +5 INT CLR DRU BRD SHA NEC WIZ MAG ENC

Shannyn of Tunare server
